body:
For those who dont know, im eric, im going to be 14 years old in 27th July this summer. 
ive been here for almost 4 years, been mapdev, jr mod, and media. 
im a badlion builder as well, and i build for many other servers.
im originally an apollo member but playing this tournament with cronus.

ask me anything, and ill answer everything honestly.

replies.body:
one of my best buds. in the very old avicus i thought you are annoying af until you got more into the competitive scene then i actually got to meet you. has good levels of banter and gives good feedback on whatever needed. on skill aspect, very good with the bow, and needs to be a little better with the sword, and then you will be really top tier mineman.

cLick cLick 



uhh for what gamemode :/
tdm: crossfire
dtm: senex scrim
ctw: rendezvous 3 ctw
koth: fracture :)

favorite map i made is a pretty hard question, but the last map we made seems to look really good to me

if its including league then the match where i broke the mon in last 2 seconds against bc :') / the match against ec for 3rd place in rtv where i double capped.

replies.body:
Hey Eric! I've been through think and thin with you as a friend and teammate, you're such an underated player; honestly you're superb! Glad you were unbanned and playing with you next event! Questions...

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. How do you start a conversation?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Hope you're enjoying being a top class mineman! :D

Take it easy, - Aura
replies.body_tagged:

  4. What cheers you up?

  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Hope you're enjoying being a top class mineman! :D

Take it easy, - Aura

reply_to.body:
Hey Eric! I've been through think and thin with you as a friend and teammate, you're such an underated player; honestly you're superb! Glad you were unbanned and playing with you next event! Questions...

  1. What was the last picture you took with your phone?
  2. What is the longest you have gone without sleep?
  3. If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
  4. What cheers you up?
  5. How do you start a conversation?
  6. What kind of music do you listen to?
  7. What was your first impression of me?
  8. What's the best compliment you have received?
Hope you're enjoying being a top class mineman! :D

Take it easy, - Aura
